GLOverlayUI API Reference¶

Docstring API¶

Handle the main frame application layout.

Author

Umar Ba jUmarB@protonmail.com

Defines

APP_TITLE¶
APP_VERSION¶
APP_ICO¶
DEF_BASE_SIZE¶

Define the default base size of the frame

MF_SIZE¶

Will have a square main frame window

DEF_FRAME_STYLE(_EXCLUDE_OPTION)¶

Desable Option or Exclude option about frame style and behavior

class GLOverlayUI_APP : public wxApp¶
#include <mainframe.H>

Handle Global Application state.

Public Functions

virtual bool OnInit(void)¶
class MainFrame : public wxFrame¶
#include <mainframe.H>

Responsible about main frame layout GLOverlayUI application.

Public Functions

MainFrame(std::basic_string<char> application_title)¶

MainFrame class Constructor.

Parameters:

application_title – - The Application title

virtual ~MainFrame()¶

MainFrame class Destructor.

void setup_menubar(void)¶

setup the menu bar

void define_layout(void)¶

define the layout UI

virtual int panel_sizing_layout_rule(void)¶

setting rule on how panels should be arranged

Returns:

int - (canvaspanel size | control panel size)

Private Functions

void on_exit(wxCommandEvent &evt)¶

handle on exit event

Parameters:

evt – - the event

void on_about(wxCommandEvent &evt)¶

handle on exit event

Parameters:

evt – - the event

void on_checking(wxCommandEvent &evt)¶

Handle checkbox event

void on_sliding(wxCommandEvent &evt)¶

Handle slider event.

Private Members

CanvasDriver *_canvas_driver¶

Kind of bridge for layout interaction and OpenGL render.

Author

Umar Ba jUmaB@protonmail.com

class CanvasDriver : public wxGLCanvas¶
#include <canvasdriver.H>

Responsable to render OpenGL stuff on Canvas Frame layout
